FuncDef: The reset ptp statistics command clears statistics about PTP packets on interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about PTP packets of all interfaces.
-

Clears statistics about PTP packets on a specific interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about PTP packets on a specific interface or all interfaces, run the reset ptp statistics command. After this, run the display ptp interface interface-type interface-number command to display statistics about PTP packets. The command output helps you check whether PTP device can implement time synchronization.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
